pkgmetadata.longdescription: Geocoding with the 'ArcGIS' REST API Service // Lite interface for finding locations of addresses or businesses around the world using the 'ArcGIS' REST API service https://developers.arcgis.com/rest/geocode/api- reference/overview-world-geocoding-service.htm. Address text can be converted to location candidates and a location can be converted into an address.
